name: eater
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who eats a particular amount or type of food, eats in a particular way, or has a particular attitude towards food: picky/fussy eater Picky/fussy eaters like bland food.meat eater They seriously think they can win meat eaters over to vegetarianism.a big eater Please don't worry about me -- I'm not a big eater, anyway.a good eater The children are good eaters -- they'll eat anything!a small eater I'm a small eater, and even for me it wasn't enough.
